books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the Italian Renaissance polymath which connects his work in various disciplines.
books.name: LEONARDO DA VINCI

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Major events and battles during the Revolutionary War are told from several perspectives.
books.name: KILLING ENGLAND

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the Union general of the Civil War and two-term president of the United States.
books.name: GRANT

books.author: by Hillary Clinton
books.description: An inside look at her campaign and how she recovered in its aftermath.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED

books.author: by Scott Kelly
books.description: A memoir by the retired astronaut and former commander of the International Space Station.
books.name: ENDURANCE

books.author: by Gabrielle Union
books.description: Essays by the actress and activist on love, step-parenting and living beyond personal tragedy.
books.name: WE'RE GOING TO NEED MORE WINE

books.author: edited by Bandy X. Lee
books.description: 27 psychiatrists and mental health experts give their assessments of the president.
books.name: THE DANGEROUS CASE OF DONALD TRUMP

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A series of essays that cover each year of the Obama administration, the writer's own journey and the echoes of American history in modern times.
books.name: WE WERE EIGHT YEARS IN POWER

books.author: by Kelly Weinersmith and Zach Weinersmith
books.description: A humorous overview of emerging technological advances and their potential outcomes.
books.name: SOONISH

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Ron Hall and Denver Moore with Lynn Vincent
books.description: The unlikely friendship between a homeless drifter and a successful art dealer who meet at a shelter in Texas.
books.name: SAME KIND OF DIFFERENT AS ME

books.author: by Gucci Mane with Neil Martinez-Belkin
books.description: A memoir by the East Atlanta hip-hop artist, who made a comeback.
books.name: THE AUTOBIOGRAPHY OF GUCCI MANE

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of the movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Amy Tan
books.description: Personal recollections of storytelling, family memorabilia and writing fiction.
books.name: WHERE THE PAST BEGINS
